trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around July 19th 2000
divs: Sighting Details IM DOING THIS AGAIN. YOU MAY NOT HAVE GOTTENFIRST. WAS AT A LIGHT WAITING TO CROSS STREET. HEARD HELICOPTER. LOOKED UP. SAWONE PULLING LARGE BANNER-AD. WAS ABOUT TO LOOK DOWN AS BANNER WAS LEAVING MYFIELD OF VISION. SOMETHING VERY HIGH ABOVE--STRAIGHT UP-CAUGHT MY EYE. TOLD MYFRIEND. SHE LOOKED UP AND SAW TOO. A CLUSTER OF ROUND OBJECTS. JUST THERE--NOTMOVING. WATCHED ABOUT 2 MINUTES. THEN ONE OF THEM MOVES OFF TO THE RIGHT, NOTTOO FAR. STARTS TO GO ROUND AND ROUND IN A TIGHT CIRCLE. A BIT LATER, ANOTHERDOES SAME. THEN HIGH CIRRUS CLOUDS COME AND BLOCK OUR VIEW. AS WE ARE STRAININGTO SEE, ONE OF THEMCOMES OUT OF THE CLOUDS REALLY FAST GOING NORTH. WE BOTHFOLLOW IT UNTIL ABOUT10 SECONDS LATER, WHEN AGAIN IT IS OBSCURED BY HIGH CLOUDS.IT LOOKED LIKE IT WAS GOING ABOUT 5 TIMES THE SPEED OF A REALLY FAST MILITARYJET. WE LOOKED BACK BUT COULD SEE NOTHING MORE. WOW IS ALL I CAN SAY. WHAT WASTHAT?!
